trans-unit.source: Prior to webpack 5 it was common to use:
trans-unit.target: 在webpack 5之前,人们普遍使用。

trans-unit.source: Prior to webpack, front-end developers would use tools like grunt and gulp to process these assets and move them from their /src folder into their /dist or /build directory. The same idea was used for JavaScript modules, but tools like webpack will dynamically bundle all dependencies (creating what's known as a dependency graph). This is great because every module now explicitly states its dependencies and we'll avoid bundling modules that aren't in use.
trans-unit.target: 到的WebPack之前，前端开发人员会使用工具，如咕噜并一饮而尽处理这些资产，他们从移动 /src 目录文件夹到他们 /dist 或 /build 目录。JavaScript模块使用了相同的想法，但是webpack之类的工具将动态捆绑所有依赖项（创建所谓的依赖关系图）。这非常好，因为每个模块现在都明确声明了其依赖关系，我们将避免捆绑未使用的模块。

trans-unit.source: Prior to webpack, front-end developers would use tools like grunt and gulp to process these assets and move them from their /src folder into their /dist or /build directory. The same idea was used for JavaScript modules, but tools like webpack will dynamically bundle all dependencies (creating what's known as a dependency graph). This is great because every module now explicitly states its dependencies and we'll avoid bundling modules that aren't in use.
trans-unit.target: 在使用webpack之前，前端开发人员将使用grunt和gulp之类的工具来处理这些资产，并将其从 /src 文件夹移至 /dist 或 /build 目录。JavaScript模块使用了相同的想法，但是webpack之类的工具将动态捆绑所有依赖项（创建所谓的依赖关系图）。这非常好，因为每个模块现在都明确声明了其依赖关系，我们将避免捆绑未使用的模块。

trans-unit.source: Progressive Web Application
trans-unit.target: 渐进式网络应用

trans-unit.source: Progressive Web Applications (or PWAs) are web apps that deliver an experience similar to native applications. There are many things that can contribute to that. Of these, the most significant is the ability for an app to be able to function when offline. This is achieved through the use of a web technology called Service Workers.
trans-unit.target: 渐进式Web应用程序（或PWA）是可提供与本机应用程序相似的体验的Web应用程序。有很多事情可以促成这一点。在这些功能中，最重要的是使应用能够在离线状态下运行的能力。这是通过使用称为Service Workers的网络技术来实现的。

trans-unit.source: Putting the content of helpers into each chunk will result into its code being downloaded twice. By using a separate chunk this will only happen once. We pay the cost of an additional request, which could be considered a tradeoff. That's why there is a minimum size of 30kb.
trans-unit.target: 将 helpers 的内容放入每个块中将导致其代码被下载两次。通过使用单独的块，这只会发生一次。我们会支付额外请求的费用，这可以视为一种折衷。这就是为什么最小大小为30kb的原因。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when implementing the HMR interface in a module, you can describe what should happen when the module is updated. However, in most cases, it's not mandatory to write HMR code in every module. If a module has no HMR handlers, the update bubbles up. This means that a single handler can update a complete module tree. If a single module from the tree is updated, the entire set of dependencies is reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 同样,当在一个模块中实现 HMR 接口时,你可以描述模块更新时应该发生什么。然而,在大多数情况下,并不是必须在每个模块中都写 HMR 代码。如果一个模块没有HMR处理程序,更新就会冒泡。这意味着,一个处理程序可以更新一个完整的模块树。如果更新了树中的一个模块,整个依赖关系集就会被重新加载。

trans-unit.source: So now you have a little bit of insight about how webpack works behind the scenes. "But, how does this affect me?", you might ask. The simple answer is that most of the time it doesn't. The runtime will do its thing, utilizing the manifest, and everything will appear to just magically work once your application hits the browser. However, if you decide to improve the performance of your projects by utilizing browser caching, this process will all of a sudden become an important thing to understand.
trans-unit.target: 所以现在你对webpack的幕后工作有了一点点的了解。"但是,这对我有什么影响?",你可能会问。简单的回答是,大多数时候它不会影响我。运行时将利用manifest做它的事情,一旦你的应用程序进入浏览器,所有的东西都会神奇地工作。然而,如果你决定通过利用浏览器缓存来提高项目的性能,那么这个过程就会突然变得很重要,需要了解。

trans-unit.source: So now you have a little bit of insight about how webpack works behind the scenes. "But, how does this affect me?", you might ask. The simple answer is that most of the time it doesn't. The runtime will do its thing, utilizing the manifest, and everything will appear to just magically work once your application hits the browser. However, if you decide to improve your projects performance by utilizing browser caching, this process will all of a sudden become an important thing to understand.
trans-unit.target: 所以现在你对webpack的幕后工作有了一点点的了解。"但是,这对我有什么影响?",你可能会问。简单的回答是,大多数时候它不会影响我。运行时会利用manifest做它的事情,一旦你的应用程序进入浏览器,所有的东西都会神奇地工作。然而,如果你决定通过利用浏览器缓存来提高项目的性能,这个过程就会突然变得很重要。

trans-unit.source: So we're now at the happy point of having produced a Service Worker. What's next?
trans-unit.target: 所以,我们现在已经到了幸福的地步,已经产生了一名服务人员。下一步是什么?

trans-unit.source: So we're using webpack to bundle our modular application which yields a deployable /dist directory. Once the contents of /dist have been deployed to a server, clients (typically browsers) will hit that server to grab the site and its assets. The last step can be time consuming, which is why browsers use a technique called caching. This allows sites to load faster with less unnecessary network traffic. However, it can also cause headaches when you need new code to be picked up.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们使用webpack捆绑了模块化应用程序，从而产生了可部署的 /dist 目录。将 /dist 的内容部署到服务器后，客户端（通常是浏览器）将命中该服务器以抢占该站点及其资产。最后一步可能很耗时，这就是为什么浏览器使用一种称为缓存的技术的原因。这使站点能够以更少的不必要网络流量更快地加载。但是，当您需要提取新代码时，它也会引起头痛。

trans-unit.source: So we're using webpack to bundle our modular application which yields a deployable /dist directory. Once the contents of /dist have been deployed to a server, clients (typically browsers) will hit that server to grab the site and its assets. The last step can be time consuming, which is why browsers use a technique called caching. This allows sites to load faster with less unnecessary network traffic, however it can also cause headaches when you need new code to be picked up.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们使用webpack捆绑了模块化应用程序，从而产生了可部署的 /dist 目录。 /dist 的内容部署到服务器后，客户端（通常是浏览器）将命中该服务器以抢占该站点及其资产。最后一步可能很耗时，这就是为什么浏览器使用一种称为缓存的技术的原因。这样可以使站点以较少的不必要的网络流量更快地加载，但是当您需要提取新代码时，也可能引起麻烦。

trans-unit.source: So while webpack's core focus is bundling, there are a variety of extensions that can enable you to use it for jobs typical of a task runner. Integrating a separate tool adds complexity, so be sure to weigh the pros and cons before going forward.

trans-unit.source: Some of what has been described above can also be achieved by using the command line. For example, the --optimize-minimize flag will include the TerserPlugin behind the scenes. And, webpack -p will automatically invoke both those flags and thus the plugins to be included.

The --define process.env.NODE_ENV="'production'" will do the same for the DefinePlugin instance described above. And, webpack -p will automatically invoke both those flags and thus the plugins to be included.

trans-unit.source: Step 1 will be done during the chunk loading. Step 2 will be done during the module evaluation interleaved with other (local and remote) modules. This way, evaluation order is unaffected by converting a module from local to remote or the other way around.
trans-unit.target: 第1步将在分块加载过程中完成,第2步将在模块评估过程中与其他(本地和远程)模块交错进行。第2步将在模块评估过程中与其他(本地和远程)模块交错进行。这样一来,评估的顺序不会因为模块从本地转换到远程或反过来而受到影响。

trans-unit.source: System modules require that a global variable System is present in the browser when the webpack bundle is executed. Compiling to System.register format allows you to System.import('/bundle.js') without additional configuration and have your webpack bundle loaded into the System module registry.
trans-unit.target: 系统模块要求执行webpack捆绑包时浏览器中存在全局变量 System 。编译为 System.register 格式后，您无需进行其他配置即可转换为 System.import('/bundle.js') ，并将Webpack捆绑包加载到系统模块注册表中。

trans-unit.source: Technically, NODE_ENV is a system environment variable that Node.js exposes into running scripts. It is used by convention to determine dev-vs-prod behavior by server tools, build scripts, and client-side libraries. Contrary to expectations, process.env.NODE_ENV is not set to "production"within the build script webpack.config.js, see #2537. Thus, conditionals like process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? '[name].[hash].bundle.js' : '[name].bundle.js' within webpack configurations do not work as expected.
trans-unit.target: 从技术上讲， NODE_ENV 是Node.js公开到正在运行的脚本中的系统环境变量。按照惯例，它可以通过服务器工具，构建脚本和客户端库来确定dev-vs-prod行为。与预期相反， process.env.NODE_ENV 没有被设置为 "production" 内构建脚本 webpack.config.js ，见＃2537。因此，条件类似于 process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? '[name].[hash].bundle.js' : '[name].bundle.js' Webpack配置中的'[name]。[hash] .bundle.js'：'[name] .bundle.js'不能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Technically, NODE_ENV is a system environment variable that Node.js exposes into running scripts. It is used by convention to determine dev-vs-prod behavior by server tools, build scripts, and client-side libraries. Contrary to expectations, process.env.NODE_ENV is not set to 'production'within the build script webpack.config.js, see #2537. Thus, conditionals like process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? '[name].[contenthash].bundle.js' : '[name].bundle.js' within webpack configurations do not work as expected.
trans-unit.target: 从技术上讲， NODE_ENV 是Node.js公开到正在运行的脚本中的系统环境变量。按照惯例，它可以通过服务器工具，构建脚本和客户端库来确定dev-vs-prod行为。与预期相反， process.env.NODE_ENV 没有被设置为 'production' 内构建脚本 webpack.config.js ，见＃2537。因此，条件类似于 process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? '[name].[contenthash].bundle.js' : '[name].bundle.js' Webpack配置中的'[name]。[contenthash] .bundle.js'：'[name] .bundle.js'无法正常工作。

trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 显示大块的父母，孩子和兄弟姐妹。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to exclude the matching assets information. This can be done with a string, a RegExp, a function that is getting the assets name as an argument and returns a boolean. stats.excludeAssets can be an array of any of the above.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 排除匹配的资产信息。这可以用做 string ，一个 RegExp ，一个 function 是获取资产名作为参数，并返回一个 boolean 。 stats.excludeAssets 可以是上述任何一个的 array 。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to exclude the matching modules information. This can be done with a string, a RegExp, a function that is getting the module's source as an argument and returns a boolean. stats.excludeModules can be an array of any of the above. stats.excludeModules's configuration is merged with the stats.exclude's configuration value.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 排除匹配的模块信息。这可以用做 string ，一个 RegExp ，一个 function 是越来越模块的源作为参数，并返回一个 boolean 。 stats.excludeModules 可以是上述任何一个的 array 。 stats.excludeModules 的配置与 stats.exclude 的配置值合并。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to exclude the warnings that are matching given filters. This can be done with a string, a RegExp, a function that is getting a warning as an argument and returns a boolean. stats.warningsFilter can be an array of any of the above.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 排除与给定过滤器匹配的警告。这可以用做 string ，一个 RegExp ，一个 function 是得到一个警示作为参数，并返回一个 boolean 。 stats.warningsFilter 可以是上述任何一个的 array 。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to include the debug information of the specified loggers such as Plugins or Loaders. When stats.logging is set to false, stats.loggingDebug option is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 包括指定记录程序（例如插件或加载程序）的调试信息。当 stats.logging 设置为 false 时， stats.loggingDebug 选项将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to show dependencies and the origin of warnings/errors. stats.moduleTrace is available since webpack 2.5.0.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 显示依赖性和警告/错误的来源。 stats.moduleTrace 自webpack 2.5.0起可用。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to show performance hint when the file size exceeds performance.maxAssetSize.
trans-unit.target: 当文件大小超过 performance.maxAssetSize 时，告诉 stats 显示性能提示。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to show the outputPath.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 显示 outputPath 。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to show the publicPath.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 显示 publicPath 。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to show the exports of the modules.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 以显示模块的导出。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to sort the assets by a given field. All of the sorting fields are allowed to be used as values for stats.assetsSort. Use ! prefix in the value to reverse the sort order by a given field.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 按给定字段对资产进行排序。允许将所有排序字段用作 stats.assetsSort 的值。使用 ! 在值中添加前缀以反转给定字段的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to sort the chunks by a given field. All of the sorting fields are allowed to be used as values for stats.chunksSort. Use ! prefix in the value to reverse the sort order by a given field.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 按给定字段对块进行排序。允许将所有排序字段用作 stats.chunksSort 的值。使用 ! 在值中添加前缀以反转给定字段的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats to sort the modules by a given field. All of the sorting fields are allowed to be used as values for stats.modulesSort. Use ! prefix in the value to reverse the sort order by a given field.
trans-unit.target: 讲述 stats 由某一领域的模块进行排序。允许将所有排序字段用作 stats.modulesSort 的值。使用 ! 在值中添加前缀以反转给定字段的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about assets inside modules. Set stats.moduleAssets to false to hide it.
trans-unit.target: 告知 stats 是否在模块内添加有关资产的信息。将 stats.moduleAssets 设置为 false 可以将其隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about assets that are related to other assets (like SourceMaps for assets).
trans-unit.target: 告知 stats 是否添加有关与其他资产相关的资产的信息（例如资产的SourceMap）。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about cached (not built) modules.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关缓存（未构建）模块的信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about runtime modules.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关运行时模块的信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the namedChunkGroups.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关 namedChunkGroups 的信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the built modules to information about the chunk.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否将有关已构建模块的信息添加到有关块的信息中。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the built modules.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关已构建模块的信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the cached assets. Setting stats.cachedAssets to false will tell stats to only show the emitted files (not the ones that were built).
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关缓存资产的信息。将 stats.cachedAssets 设置为 false 将使 stats 仅显示发出的文件（而不显示已生成的文件）。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the cached modules (not the ones that were built).
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关缓存模块的信息（而不是已构建的模块）。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the children.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关子代的信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add information about the chunk. Setting stats.chunks to false results in a less verbose output.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加有关块的信息。将 stats.chunks 设置为 false 会导致输出的详细程度降低。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to add logging output.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否添加日志记录输出。

trans-unit.target: 告知 stats 是否将详细信息添加到错误中。默认为 'auto' ，当只有2个或更少的错误时，它将显示错误详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to display the --env information.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示 --env 信息。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to display the distance from the entry point for each module.

trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示带有相应捆绑商品的入口点。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to display the errors.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示错误。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to group assets by how their are related to chunks.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否按资产与组块的关系对资产进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to group assets by their asset info (immutable, development, hotModuleReplacement, etc).
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否按资产信息（不可变，开发，hotModuleReplacement等）对资产进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to group assets by their status (emitted, compared for emit or cached).
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否按资产状态（发射，比较发射或缓存）对资产进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to group modules by their attributes (errors, warnings, assets, optional, orphan, or dependent).
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否按模块属性（错误，警告，资产，可选，孤立或依赖）对模块进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to hide orphan modules. A module is an orphan if it is not included in any chunk. Orphan modules are hidden by default in stats.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否隐藏 orphan 模块。如果模块未包含在任何块中，则该模块是 orphan 。默认情况下，孤立模块在 stats 处于隐藏状态。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to output in the different colors.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否以不同的颜色输出。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to show chunk modules that are dependencies of other modules of the chunk.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示块模块，这些块模块是该块的其他模块的依存关系。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to show stack trace of errors.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示错误的堆栈跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to show the asset information. Set stats.assets to false to hide it.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示资产信息。将 stats.assets 设置为 false 可以将其隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Tells stats whether to show which exports of a module are used.
trans-unit.target: 告诉 stats 是否显示使用了模块的哪些导出。

trans-unit.target: 告诉连接到 devServer 的客户端使用提供的套接字主机。

trans-unit.source: Tells clients connected to devServer to use provided socket port.
trans-unit.target: 告诉连接到 devServer 的客户端使用提供的套接字端口。

trans-unit.source: Tells dev-server to open the browser after server had been started. Set it to true to open your default browser.

trans-unit.source: Tells webpack to determine and flag chunks which are subsets of other chunks in a way that subsets don’t have to be loaded when the bigger chunk has been already loaded. By default optimization.flagIncludedChunks is enabled in productionmode and disabled elsewise.

trans-unit.source: Tells webpack to determine and flag chunks which are subsets of other chunks in a way that subsets don’t have to be loaded when the bigger chunk has been already loaded. By default optimization.flagIncludedChunks is enabled in productionmode and disabled elsewise.

trans-unit.source: Tells webpack to determine used exports for each module. This depends on optimization.providedExports. Information collected by optimization.usedExports is used by other optimizations or code generation i.e. exports are not generated for unused exports, export names are mangled to single char identifiers when all usages are compatible. Dead code elimination in minimizers will benefit from this and can remove unused exports. By default optimization.usedExports is enabled in productionmode and disabled elsewise.
trans-unit.target: 告诉webpack确定每个模块使用的导出。这取决于 optimization.providedExports 。由 optimization.usedExports 收集的信息将由其他优化或代码生成使用，即，不为未使用的导出生成导出，当所有用法兼容时，导出名称将压缩为单个字符标识符。最小化器中消除死代码将受益于此，并且可以删除未使用的导出。默认情况下， optimization.usedExports 在启用 production 模式和残疾人elsewise。

trans-unit.source: Tells webpack to determine used exports for each module. This depends on optimization.providedExports. Dead code elimination in minimizers will benefit from this and can remove unused exports.

trans-unit.source: Tells webpack to determine used exports for each module. This depends on optimization.providedExports. Dead code elimination in minimizers will benefit from this and can remove unused exports.

You can either let the plugin generate an HTML file for you, supply your own template using lodash templates, or use your own loader.

trans-unit.source: The mocha-webpack utility can be used for a clean integration with Mocha. The repository offers more details on the pros and cons but essentially mocha-webpack is a simple wrapper that provides almost the same CLI as Mocha itself and provides various webpack functionality like an improved watch mode and improved path resolution. Here is a small example of how you would install it and use it to run a test suite (found within ./test):
trans-unit.target: 在 mocha-webpack 工具可以用于与摩卡干净的整合。该存储库提供了有关优缺点的更多详细信息，但从本质 mocha-webpack 是一个简单的包装程序，提供与Mocha本身几乎相同的CLI，并提供了各种webpack功能，例如改进的监视模式和改进的路径分辨率。这是一个有关如何安装并使用它运行测试套件的小示例（位于 ./test 中）：

trans-unit.source: The require.resolve call is a Node.js function (unrelated to require.resolve in webpack processing). require.resolve gives you the absolute path to the module ("/.../app/node_modules/react/react.js"). So the expose only applies to the react module. And it's only exposed when used in the bundle.
trans-unit.target: 所述 require.resolve 呼叫是Node.js的函数（无关 require.resolve 中的WebPack处理）。 require.resolve 为您提供了模块的绝对路径（ "/.../app/node_modules/react/react.js" ）。因此，公开仅适用于react模块。并且仅在捆绑销售中使用时才暴露。

trans-unit.source: The require.resolve call is a Node.js function (unrelated to require.resolve in webpack processing). require.resolve gives you the absolute path to the module ("/.../app/node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js"). So the expose only applies to the jquery module. And it's only exposed when used in the bundle.
trans-unit.target: 所述 require.resolve 呼叫是Node.js的函数（无关 require.resolve 中的WebPack处理）。 require.resolve 为您提供模块的绝对路径（ "/.../app/node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js" ）。因此，公开仅适用于 jquery 模块。并且仅在捆绑销售中使用时才暴露。

trans-unit.source: The ES2015 Loader spec defines import() as method to load ES2015 modules dynamically on runtime.
trans-unit.target: 的ES2015装载机规范定义 import() 作为方法来运行时动态地加载ES2015模块。

trans-unit.source: The 'amd-require' target allows for the use of AMD dependencies without needing a separate later invocation. As with the 'amd' target, this depends on the appropriate require function being available in the environment in which the webpack output is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在 'amd-require' 目标允许使用AMD依赖关系，而不需要单独的后调用。与 'amd' 目标一样，这取决于在加载webpack输出的环境中可用的适当的 require 函数。

trans-unit.source: The 'commonjs ' + request defines the type of module that needs to be externalized.
trans-unit.target: 该 'commonjs ' + request 定义了需要被外部化模块的类型。

trans-unit.source: The 'flag' value is used by default in non-production builds.
trans-unit.target: 的 'flag' 非生产构建值默认使用。

trans-unit.target: 所述 --env 参数接受多个值：

trans-unit.source: The --env argument accepts various syntaxes:
trans-unit.target: 该 --env 参数接受各种语法：

trans-unit.source: The --json > compilation-stats.json flag indicates to webpack that it should emit the compilation-stats.json containing the dependency graph and various other build information. Typically, the --profile flag is also added so that a profile section is added to each modules object containing module-specific compilation stats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 --json > compilation-stats.json 标志指示到的WebPack它应该发出的 compilation-stats.json 含有依赖图和各种其它构建信息。通常，还会添加 --profile 标志，以便将 profile 部分添加到每个包含模块特定编译统计信息的 modules 对象。

trans-unit.source: The --json=compilation-stats.json flag indicates to webpack that it should emit the compilation-stats.json containing the dependency graph and various other build information. Typically, the --profile flag is also added so that a profile section is added to each modules object containing module-specific compilation stats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 --json=compilation-stats.json 标志指示到的WebPack它应该发出的 compilation-stats.json 含有依赖图和各种其它构建信息。通常，还会添加 --profile 标志，以便将 profile 部分添加到每个包含模块特定编译统计信息的 modules 对象。

trans-unit.source: The --profile option captures timing information for each step of the compilation and includes this in the output.
trans-unit.target: 该 --profile 用于编译的每个步骤选项捕获定时信息，并包括这在输出中。

trans-unit.source: The AutomaticPrefetchPlugin discovers all modules from the previous compilation upfront while watching for changes, trying to improve the incremental build times. Compared to PrefetchPlugin which discovers a single module upfront.
trans-unit.target: 该 AutomaticPrefetchPlugin 发现所有模块从以前编译前期，同时观察变化，努力提高增量生成时间。与 PrefetchPlugin 相比，后者可以预先发现一个模块。

trans-unit.source: The CommonsChunkPlugin is an opt-in feature that creates a separate file (known as a chunk), consisting of common modules shared between multiple entry points.
trans-unit.target: 所述 CommonsChunkPlugin 是一个选择的功能，创建了一个单独的文件中（被称为块），由多个入口点之间共享的公共模块。

trans-unit.source: The Compilation class also extends Tapable and provides the following lifecycle hooks. They can be tapped the same way as compiler hooks:
trans-unit.target: 所述 Compilation 类还延伸 Tapable 并提供了以下的生命周期的钩子。可以使用与编译器挂钩相同的方式来窃听它们：

trans-unit.source: The Compilation module is used by the Compiler to create new compilations (or builds). A compilation instance has access to all modules and their dependencies (most of which are circular references). It is the literal compilation of all the modules in the dependency graph of an application. During the compilation phase, modules are loaded, sealed, optimized, chunked, hashed and restored.
trans-unit.target: 的 Compilation 模块，用于由所述 Compiler 来创建新的汇编（或版本）。一个 compilation 实例可以访问所有的模块和它们的依赖（其中大部分是循环引用）。它是应用程序依赖关系图中所有模块的文字汇编。在编译阶段，将对模块进行加载，密封，优化，分块，散列和还原。

trans-unit.source: The Compiler module is the main engine that creates a compilation instance with all the options passed through the CLI or Node API. It extends the Tapable class in order to register and call plugins. Most user facing plugins are first registered on the Compiler.
trans-unit.target: 该 Compiler 模块是创建具有全部通过传递的选项编译实例的主引擎CLI或节点API。它扩展了 Tapable 类，以便注册和调用插件。大多数面向用户的插件都首先在 Compiler 上注册。

trans-unit.source: The Compiler supports watching which monitors the file system and recompiles as files change. When in watch mode, the compiler will emit the additional events such as watchRun, watchClose, and invalid. This is typically used in development, usually under the hood of tools like webpack-dev-server, so that the developer doesn't need to re-compile manually every time. Watch mode can also be entered via the CLI.
trans-unit.target: 该 Compiler 支持看着它监视文件系统和重新编译的文件变化。在监视模式下，编译器将发出其他事件，例如 watchRun ， watchClose 和 invalid 。这通常用于开发中，通常在诸如 webpack-dev-server 之类的工具的支持下使用，因此开发人员无需每次都手动重新编译。也可以通过CLI进入监视模式。

trans-unit.source: The ContextExclusionPlugin allows you to exclude context. Provide RegExp as an argument when initializing the Plugin to exclude all context that matches it.
trans-unit.target: 该 ContextExclusionPlugin 让你排除上下文。初始化插件以排除与其匹配的所有上下文时，请提供RegExp作为参数。

trans-unit.source: The ContextModuleFactory class extends Tapable and provides the following lifecycle hooks. They can be tapped the same way as compiler hooks:
trans-unit.target: 所述 ContextModuleFactory 类扩展 Tapable 并提供了以下的生命周期的钩子。可以使用与编译器挂钩相同的方式来窃听它们：

trans-unit.source: The ContextModuleFactory module is used by the Compiler to generate dependencies from webpack specific require.context API. It resolves the requested directory, generates requests for each file and filters against passed regExp. Matching dependencies then passes through NormalModuleFactory.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ContextModuleFactory 模块用于由 Compiler 产生从特定的WebPack依赖require.context API。它解析请求的目录，为每个文件生成请求，并根据传递的regExp进行过滤。匹配的依赖项然后通过NormalModuleFactory传递。

trans-unit.source: The ContextReplacementPlugin allows you to override the inferred information. There are various ways to configure the plugin:
trans-unit.target: 该 ContextReplacementPlugin 允许您覆盖推断的信息。有多种方法可以配置插件：

trans-unit.source: The DefinePlugin allows you to create global constants which can be configured at compile time. This can be useful for allowing different behavior between development builds and production builds. If you perform logging in your development build but not in the production build you might use a global constant to determine whether logging takes place. That's where DefinePlugin shines, set it and forget it rules for development and production builds.
trans-unit.target: 该 DefinePlugin 允许您创建可在配置全局常量的编译时间。这对于在开发版本和生产版本之间允许不同的行为很有用。如果在开发版本中而不是生产版本中执行日志记录，则可以使用全局常量来确定是否进行日志记录。那就是 DefinePlugin 闪耀的地方，进行设置并忘记它的开发和生产构建规则。

trans-unit.source: The DefinePlugin allows you to create global constants which can be configured at compile time. This can be useful for allowing different behavior between development builds and release builds. If you perform logging in your development build but not in the release build you might use a global constant to determine whether logging takes place. That's where DefinePlugin shines, set it and forget it rules for development and release builds.
trans-unit.target: 该 DefinePlugin 允许您创建可在配置全局常量的编译时间。这对于允许开发版本和发行版本之间的行为不同很有用。如果在开发版本中执行日志记录，而不在发布版本中执行日志记录，则可以使用全局常量来确定是否进行日志记录。那就是 DefinePlugin 闪耀的地方，进行设置并忘记它的开发和发布版本规则。

trans-unit.source: The DllPlugin and DllReferencePlugin provide means to split bundles in a way that can drastically improve build time performance.
trans-unit.target: 的 DllPlugin 和 DllReferencePlugin 提供手段，在能够显着提高编译时间性能的方式分裂束。

trans-unit.source: The DllPlugin and DllReferencePlugin provide means to split bundles in a way that can drastically improve build time performance. The term "DLL" stands for Dynamic-link library which was originally introduced by Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: 的 DllPlugin 和 DllReferencePlugin 提供手段，在能够显着提高编译时间性能的方式分裂束。术语“ DLL”代表最初由Microsoft引入的动态链接库。

trans-unit.source: The EnvironmentPlugin accepts either an array of keys or an object mapping its keys to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 EnvironmentPlugin 可以接受的按键阵列或对象映射其键为默认值。

trans-unit.source: The EnvironmentPlugin is shorthand for using the DefinePlugin on process.env keys.
trans-unit.target: 该 EnvironmentPlugin 是使用速记 DefinePlugin 上 process.env 键。

trans-unit.source: The LoaderOptionsPlugin is unlike other plugins in that it is built for migration from webpack 1 to 2. In webpack 2, the schema for a webpack.config.js became stricter; no longer open for extension by other loaders and plugins. The intention is that you pass options directly to loaders and plugins (i.e. options are not global or shared).
trans-unit.target: 所述 LoaderOptionsPlugin 不同于其他插件，它是专为从迁移的WebPack 1〜2。的WebPack 2，对于该模式 webpack.config.js 变得更严格; 不再开放供其他加载程序和插件扩展。目的是使你通过 options 直接装载机和插件（即 options 是不是全局或共享）。

trans-unit.source: The MultiCompiler module allows webpack to run multiple configurations in separate compilers. If the options parameter in the webpack's NodeJS api is an array of options, webpack applies separate compilers and calls the callback after all compilers have been executed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MultiCompiler 模块允许的WebPack运行在单独的编译器的多个配置。如果webpack的NodeJS api中的 options 参数是选项数组，则webpack将应用单独的编译器，并在所有编译器都已执行后调用 callback 。

trans-unit.source: The MultiCompiler module allows webpack to run multiple configurations in separate compilers. If the options parameter in the webpack's NodeJS api is an array of options, webpack applies separate compilers and calls the callback method at the end of each compiler execution.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MultiCompiler 模块允许的WebPack运行在单独的编译器的多个配置。如果webpack的NodeJS api中的 options 参数是选项数组，则webpack将应用单独的编译器，并在每次编译器执行结束时调用 callback 方法。

trans-unit.source: The NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin allows you to avoid emitting assets when there are any errors. Enabled by default, you can disable using optimization.emitOnErrors
trans-unit.target: 该 NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin 可以让你避免发射时的资产有任何错误。默认情况下启用，您可以禁用使用 optimization.emitOnErrors

trans-unit.source: The NormalModuleFactory class extends Tapable and provides the following lifecycle hooks. They can be tapped the same way as compiler hooks:
trans-unit.target: 所述 NormalModuleFactory 类扩展 Tapable 并提供了以下的生命周期的钩子。可以使用与编译器挂钩相同的方式来窃听它们：

trans-unit.source: The NormalModuleFactory module is used by the Compiler to generate modules. Starting with entry points, it resolves each request, parses the content to find further requests, and keeps crawling through files by resolving all and parsing any new files. At last stage, each dependency becomes a Module instance.
trans-unit.target: 所述 NormalModuleFactory 模块用于由 Compiler 生成的模块。从入口点开始，它解析每个请求，解析内容以查找进一步的请求，并通过解析所有文件并解析任何新文件来保持对文件的爬网。在最后阶段，每个依赖项都成为一个Module实例。

trans-unit.source: The NormalModuleReplacementPlugin allows you to replace resources that match resourceRegExp with newResource. If newResource is relative, it is resolved relative to the previous resource. If newResource is a function, it is expected to overwrite the request attribute of the supplied resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 NormalModuleReplacementPlugin 允许您更换匹配的资源 resourceRegExp 与 newResource 。如果 newResource 是相对的，则相对于先前的资源进行解析。如果 newResource 是一个函数，则应覆盖提供的资源的request属性。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressPlugin is used to customize how progress should be reported during compilation, and HtmlWebpackPlugin will generate a HTML file including the my-first-webpack.bundle.js file using a script tag.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProgressPlugin 用于自定义如何进展，应在编译期间进行报告，并 HtmlWebpackPlugin 会生成一个HTML文件，包括 my-first-webpack.bundle.js 使用文件 script 标签。

trans-unit.source: The ProgressPlugin provides a way to customize how progress is reported during a compilation.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProgressPlugin 提供了一种方式来定制进展如何编译期间报告。

trans-unit.source: The [local] placeholder contains original class.
trans-unit.target: 在 [local] 占位符包含原始类。

trans-unit.source: The [name], [id], [fullhash] and [chunkhash] substitutions from output.filename can be used. In addition to those, you can use substitutions listed under Filename-level in Template strings.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 output.filename 中的 [name] ， [id] ， [fullhash] 和 [chunkhash] 替换。除此之外，您还可以使用“模板字符串”中“文件名”级别下列出的替代项。

trans-unit.source: The [name], [id], [hash] and [chunkhash] substitutions from #output-filename can be used. In addition to those, you can use substitutions listed below. The [file] placeholder is replaced with the filename of the original file. We recommend only using the [file] placeholder, as the other placeholders won't work when generating SourceMaps for non-chunk files.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用＃output-filename中的 [name] ， [id] ， [hash] 和 [chunkhash] 替换。除了这些之外，您还可以使用下面列出的替代项。的 [file] 占位符被替换的原始文件的文件名。我们建议仅使用 [file] 占位符，因为在为非块文件生成SourceMap时，其他占位符将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The app chunk will not contain the modules that react-vendors has.
trans-unit.target: 该 app 块将不包含 react-vendors 拥有的模块。

trans-unit.source: The apply method flags all updated modules as invalid. For each invalid module, there needs to be an update handler in the module or in its parent(s). Otherwise, the invalid flag bubbles up and invalidates parent(s) as well. Each bubble continues until the app's entry point or a module with an update handler is reached (whichever comes first). If it bubbles up from an entry point, the process fails.
trans-unit.target: 该 apply 方式标志所有更新的模块为无效。对于每个无效模块，模块或其父级中都需要一个更新处理程序。否则，无效标志会冒出并使父母无效。每个气泡都会持续到到达应用程序的入口点或带有更新处理程序的模块为止（以先到者为准）。如果它从入口点冒出，该过程将失败。

trans-unit.source: The autoApply parameter can either be a boolean or options to pass to the apply method when called.
trans-unit.target: 该 autoApply 参数可以是一个布尔或 options 传递给 apply 调用时方法。

trans-unit.source: The babel-preset-env package uses browserslist to transpile only what is not supported in your browsers matrix. This preset comes with the useBuiltIns option, false by default, which converts your global babel-polyfill import to a more granular feature by feature import pattern:

trans-unit.source: The exports field in the package.json of a package allows to declare which module should be used when using module requests like import "package" or import "package/sub/path". It replaces the default implementation that returns main field resp. index.js files for "package" and the file system lookup for "package/sub/path".

trans-unit.source: The extends property also supports naming installed NPM modules which export webpack configurations. Various configuration properties can also be filtered in different ways based on need.

trans-unit.source: The externals configuration option provides a way of excluding dependencies from the output bundles. Instead, the created bundle relies on that dependency to be present in the consumer's (any end-user application) environment. This feature is typically most useful to library developers, however there are a variety of applications for it.

trans-unit.source: The import() must contain at least some information about where the module is located. Bundling can be limited to a specific directory or set of files so that when you are using a dynamic expression - every module that could potentially be requested on an import() call is included. For example, import(`./locale/${language}.json`) will cause every .json file in the ./locale directory to be bundled into the new chunk. At run time, when the variable language has been computed, any file like english.json or german.json will be available for consumption.
trans-unit.target: 该 import() 必须包含在模块位于至少一些信息。捆绑可以限制为特定目录或文件集，以便在使用动态表达式时-包括可能在 import() 调用中可能请求的每个模块。例如， import(`./locale/${language}.json`) 会导致每一个 .json 在文件 ./locale 目录捆绑到新的块。在运行时，计算完可变 language ，将可以使用 english.json 或 german.json 之类的任何文件。

trans-unit.source: The source-map-loader extracts existing source maps from all JavaScript entries. This includes both inline source maps as well as those linked via URL. All source map data is passed to webpack for processing as per a chosen source map style specified by the devtool option in webpack.config.js. This loader is especially useful when using 3rd-party libraries having their own source maps. If not extracted and processed into the source map of the webpack bundle, browsers may misinterpret source map data. source-map-loader allows webpack to maintain source map data continuity across libraries so ease of debugging is preserved. The source-map-loader will extract from any JavaScript file, including those in the node_modules directory. Be mindful in setting include and exclude rule conditions to maximize bundling performance.
trans-unit.target: 在 source-map-loader 提取现有源从所有的JavaScript项映射。这包括内联源映射以及通过URL链接的源映射。所有源的地图数据被传递到的WebPack用于按照所选择的处理源地图样式由指定 devtool 在选项webpack.config.js。当使用具有自己的源映射的第三方库时，此加载器特别有用。如果未将其提取并处理到Webpack捆绑包的源地图中，则浏览器可能会误解源地图数据。 source-map-loader 允许webpack跨库维护源地图数据的连续性，从而保留了调试的便利性。所述 source-map-loader 将从任何JavaScript文件中提取，包括 node_modules 目录中的文件。注意设置包括和排除规则条件以最大程度地提高捆绑性能。

trans-unit.source: The API only supports a single concurrent compilation at a time. When using run, wait for it to finish before calling run or watch again. When using watch, call close and wait for it to finish before calling run or watch again. Concurrent compilations will corrupt the output files.
trans-unit.target: 该API一次仅支持一个并发编译。使用 run 时，请等待其完成后再调用 run 或再次 watch 。使用 watch 时，请调用 close 并等待其完成，然后再调用 run 或 watch 。并发编译将破坏输出文件。

trans-unit.source: The CSS can be extracted in one CSS file using optimization.splitChunks.cacheGroups.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 optimization.splitChunks.cacheGroups 将CSS提取到一个CSS文件中。

trans-unit.source: The Closure Library Plugin is only compatible with the AGGRESSIVE_BUNDLE mode of the Closure-Compiler webpack plugin.
trans-unit.target: Closure库插件仅与兼容 AGGRESSIVE_BUNDLE 的Closure编译器的WebPack插件的模式。

trans-unit.source: The Command Line Interface (CLI) to configure and interact with your build. It is especially useful in the case of early prototyping and profiling. For the most part, the CLI is simply used to kick off the process using a configuration file and a few flags (e.g. --env).
trans-unit.target: 命令行界面（CLI），用于配置构建并与之交互。在早期原型制作和性能分析的情况下，它特别有用。在大多数情况下，CLI仅用于使用配置文件和一些标志（例如 --env ）来启动该过程。

trans-unit.source: The Node.js API is useful in scenarios in which you need to customize the build or development process since all the reporting and error handling must be done manually and webpack only does the compiling part. For this reason the stats configuration options will not have any effect in the webpack() call.
trans-unit.target: Node.js API在需要自定义构建或开发过程的场景中很有用，因为所有报告和错误处理都必须手动完成，而webpack仅负责编译部分。因此， stats 配置选项在 webpack() 调用中不会有任何作用。
